engrams.name: Cloth Boots
engrams.description: Hide-soled shoes provide some protection from the heat and cold, but only minimal protection from injuries.

engrams.name: Cloth Gloves
engrams.description: Hide-padded gloves provide some protection from the heat and cold, but only minimal protection from injuries.

engrams.name: Cloth Hat
engrams.description: Provides some protection from the heat and cold, but only minimal protection from injuries.

engrams.name: Cloth Pants
engrams.description: Provides some protection from the heat and cold, but only minimal protection from injuries.

engrams.name: Cloth Shirt
engrams.description: Provides some protection from the heat and cold, but only minimal protection from injuries.

engrams.name: Ghillie Boots
engrams.description: Strands of Organic Polymer cause this to disperse heat and keep you cool. Camouflage keeps you more hidden from enemy creatures. Provides moderate physical protection, but less than Chitin.

engrams.name: Ghillie Chestpiece
engrams.description: Strands of Organic Polymer cause this to disperse heat and keep you cool. Camouflage keeps you more hidden from enemy creatures. Provides moderate physical protection, but less than Chitin.

engrams.name: Ghillie Gauntlets
engrams.description: Strands of Organic Polymer cause this to disperse heat and keep you cool. Camouflage keeps you more hidden from enemy creatures. Provides moderate physical protection, but less than Chitin.

engrams.name: Ghillie Leggings
engrams.description: Strands of Organic Polymer cause this to disperse heat and keep you cool. Camouflage keeps you more hidden from enemy creatures. Provides moderate physical protection, but less than Chitin.

engrams.name: Ghillie Mask
engrams.description: Strands of Organic Polymer cause this to disperse heat and keep you cool. Camouflage keeps you more hidden from enemy creatures. Provides moderate physical protection, but less than Chitin.

engrams.name: Hide Boots
engrams.description: Keeps you warm while providing some physical protection.

engrams.name: Hide Gloves
engrams.description: Keeps you warm while providing some physical protection.

engrams.name: Hide Hat
engrams.description: Keeps you warm while providing some physical protection.

engrams.name: Hide Pants
engrams.description: Keeps you warm while providing some physical protection.

engrams.name: Hide Shirt
engrams.description: Keeps you warm while providing some physical protection.

engrams.name: Wooden Shield
engrams.description: A wooden shield on a layer of leather. Absorbs damage from the front when activated.

engrams.name: Blood Extraction Syringe
engrams.description: Use this on a human to extract their blood for transfusion.

engrams.name: Flare Gun
engrams.description: A single-use flare launcher. Fires a bright ball of Sparkpowder to temporarily light an area.

engrams.name: Magnifying Glass
engrams.description: This instrument, while primitive, is effective as short-range analysis of both flora and fauna.

engrams.name: Note
engrams.description: Write your own text on a note! Or put it in a Cooking Pot to make a Custom Recipe!

engrams.name: Paintbrush
engrams.description: Apply a dye to this, then swing it at structures to paint them.

engrams.name: Parachute
engrams.description: Use this while falling to slow your fall. Jump while parachuting to deactivate it.

engrams.name: Spyglass
engrams.description: This instrument, while primitive, is quite effective at long-range reconnaissance.

engrams.name: Water Jar
engrams.description: Safely carries a lot of water, but is also a bit heavy.

engrams.name: Waterskin
engrams.description: Good to keep you hydrated, but slowly leaks water.

engrams.name: Wooden Raft
engrams.description: A floating wooden platform that you can pilot across the water. Can support the weight of structures and be built on.

engrams.name: Compass
engrams.description: Use this to find which direction you are traveling.

engrams.name: Araneo Saddle
engrams.description: Equip an Araneo with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Argentavis Saddle
engrams.description: Equip an Argentavis with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Beelzebufo Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Beelzebufo with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Carbonemys Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Carboenemys with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Dire Bear Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Dire Bear with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Hyaenodon Meatpack
engrams.description: Equip a Hyaenodon with this to give it increased meat carrying & preservation capability.

engrams.name: Ichthyosaurus Saddle
engrams.description: Equip an Ichthyosaurus with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Kaprosuchus Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Kaprosuchus with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Megalodon Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Megalodon with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Pachy Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Pachy with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Pachyrhinosaurus Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Pachyrhinosaurus with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Parasaur Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Parasaur with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Pelagornis Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Pelagornis with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Phiomia Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Phiomia with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Pteranodon Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Pteranodon with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Pulmonoscorpius Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Pulmonoscorpius with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Raptor Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Raptor with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Sarco Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Sarco with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Stego Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Stego with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Terror Bird Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Terror Bird with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Trike Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Triceratops with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Hide Sleeping Bag
engrams.description: This hide sleeping bag acts as a single-use respawn point, only usable by you.

engrams.name: Simple Bed
engrams.description: Thatch may not make the most comfortable mattress, but this bed acts as a respawn point for you and your Tribe.

engrams.name: Campfire
engrams.description: Perfect for cooking meat, staying warm, and providing light.

engrams.name: Cooking Pot
engrams.description: Must contain basic fuel to light the fire. Put various ingredients with water in this to make soups, stews, and dyes.

engrams.name: Mortar and Pestle
engrams.description: This simple stone contraption can be used to grind resources into new substances.

engrams.name: Refining Forge
engrams.description: Requires wood, thatch, or sparkpowder to activate. Put unrefined resources in this to refine them.

engrams.name: Smithy
engrams.description: Place materials along with blueprints in this to create certain advanced forged items.

engrams.name: Compost Bin
engrams.description: A large bin for converting thatch and dung into high-quality fertilizer.

engrams.name: Large Crop Plot
engrams.description: A large garden plot, with a fence to keep out vermin.

engrams.name: Medium Crop Plot
engrams.description: A medium garden plot, with a fence to keep out vermin.

engrams.name: Small Crop Plot
engrams.description: A small garden plot, with a fence to keep out vermin.

engrams.name: Preserving Bin
engrams.description: Burns simple fuel at low temperatures to dehydrate food and kill bacteria. Keeps perishables from spoiling for a small time.

engrams.name: Gravestone
engrams.description: A simple unadorned stone headstone to mark a grave or commemorate a loved one.

engrams.name: War Drums
engrams.description: A set of tribal wardrums, to let everyone around hear the power of your tribe.

engrams.name: Wooden Bench
engrams.description: A simple wooden bench for solo sitting.

engrams.name: Wooden Chair
engrams.description: A simple wooden chair for solo sitting.

engrams.name: Wooden Table
engrams.description: A simple wooden table with a variety of uses.

engrams.name: Multi-Panel Flag
engrams.description: Mark your tribes territory and show off its colours by placing this and dying it.

engrams.name: Painting Canvas
engrams.description: A canvas sheet stretched over a wooden frame. Perfect for painting on.

engrams.name: Single-Panel Flag
engrams.description: Mark your tribe's territory and show off its colors by placing this and painting it.

engrams.name: Training Dummy
engrams.description: Attack this training dummy to test your DPS!

engrams.name: Trophy Wall-Mount
engrams.description: Provides the wall-mount upon which you can place a trophy!

engrams.name: War Map
engrams.description: A map of the Island upon which you can draw your plans.

engrams.name: Stone Irrigation Pipe - Inclined
engrams.description: An inclined stone pipe for an irrigation network, used for transporting water up and down hills.

engrams.name: Stone Irrigation Pipe - Intake
engrams.description: The stone intake for an irrigation network that transports water over land.

engrams.name: Stone Irrigation Pipe - Intersection
engrams.description: A plus-shaped stone intersection for an irrigation network, used for splitting one water source into three.

engrams.name: Stone Irrigation Pipe - Straight
engrams.description: A straight stone pipe for an irrigation network, used for transporting water across land.

engrams.name: Stone Irrigation Pipe - Tap
engrams.description: This stone tap allows access to the water in an irrigation network. Can refill containers, irrigate crop plots, or provide a refreshing drink.

engrams.name: Stone Irrigation Pipe - Vertical
engrams.description: A vertical stone pipe for an irrigation network, used for transporting water up and down cliffs.

engrams.name: Water Reservoir
engrams.description: A standing storage device for holding water. Automatically fills up during rain, can be filled up with the use of a water skin/jar.

engrams.name: Reinforced Dinosaur Gate
engrams.description: A large, reinforced wooden gate that can be used with a Gateway to keep dinosaurs in or out.

engrams.name: Reinforced Trapdoor
engrams.description: This small reinforced door can be used to secure hatches.

engrams.name: Reinforced Window
engrams.description: Reinforced window covering to provide protection from projectiles and spying.

engrams.name: Reinforced Wooden Door
engrams.description: A reinforced wooden door that provides entrance to structures. Can be locked for security.

engrams.name: Sloped Stone Roof
engrams.description: An inclined stone roof. Slightly different angle than the ramp.

engrams.name: Sloped Stone Wall Left
engrams.description: A sturdy stone sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.

engrams.name: Sloped Stone Wall Right
engrams.description: A sturdy stone sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.

engrams.name: Stone Ceiling
engrams.description: A stable brick-and-mortar ceiling that insulates the inside from the outside, and doubles as a floor for higher levels.

engrams.name: Stone Dinosaur Gateway
engrams.description: A large brick-and-mortar gateway that can be used with a Gate to keep most dinosaurs in or out.

engrams.name: Stone Doorframe
engrams.description: A stone wall that provides entrance to a structure.

engrams.name: Stone Fence Foundation
engrams.description: This strong, narrow foundation is used to build walls around an area.

engrams.name: Stone Fireplace
engrams.description: A nice, relaxing fireplace. Keeps a large area very warm and provides light.

engrams.name: Stone Foundation
engrams.description: A foundation is required to build structures in an area. This one is made from brick-and-mortar.

engrams.name: Stone Hatchframe
engrams.description: This brick-and-mortar ceiling has a hole in it for trapdoors.

engrams.name: Stone Pillar
engrams.description: Adds structural integrity to the area it is built on. Can also act as stilts for buildings on inclines.

engrams.name: Stone Railing
engrams.description: A brick-and-mortar railing that acts as a simple barrier to prevent people from falling.

engrams.name: Stone Staircase
engrams.description: A stone spiral staircase, useful in constructing multi-level buildings.

engrams.name: Stone Wall
engrams.description: A brick-and-mortar wall that insulates the inside from the outside and separates rooms.

engrams.name: Stone Windowframe
engrams.description: A brick-and-mortar wall with a hole for a window.

engrams.name: Sloped Thatch Roof
engrams.description: An inclined Thatch roof. Slightly different angle than the ramp.

engrams.name: Sloped Thatch Wall Left
engrams.description: A simple Thatch sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with a roof.

engrams.name: Sloped Thatch Wall Right
engrams.description: A simple Thatch sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with a roof.

engrams.name: Thatch Door
engrams.description: Enough sticks bundled together works as a simple door. Can be locked for security, but not very strong.

engrams.name: Thatch Doorframe
engrams.description: This thatch wall has an entrance in it, but requires more wood to stay stable.

engrams.name: Thatch Foundation
engrams.description: A foundation is required to build structures. This one is a wooden frame with some smooth bundles of sticks that act as a floor.

engrams.name: Thatch Roof
engrams.description: A thatched roof to protect you from the elements. Not stable enough to build on.

engrams.name: Thatch Wall
engrams.description: A simple wall made of bundled sticks, and stabilized by a wooden frame. Fairly fragile, but better than nothing.

engrams.name: Wooden Billboard
engrams.description: A large wooden billboard for landmark navigation or relaying messages.

engrams.name: Wooden Sign
engrams.description: A simple wooden sign for landmark navigation or relaying messages.

engrams.name: Wooden Wall Sign
engrams.description: A simple wooden wall sign for basic messages, requires attaching to a wall.

engrams.name: Bookshelf
engrams.description: A large bookshelf to store Blueprints, Notes, and other small trinkets in.

engrams.name: Feeding Trough
engrams.description: Put food for your nearby pets in this, and they'll automatically eat it when hungry!

engrams.name: Large Storage Box
engrams.description: A large box to store goods in.

engrams.name: Storage Box
engrams.description: A small box to store goods in.

engrams.name: Dinosaur Gate
engrams.description: A large wooden gate that can be used with a gateway to keep dinosaurs in or out. Cannot be destroyed by any dinosaur.

engrams.name: Dinosaur Gateway
engrams.description: A large wood and stone gateway that can be used with a gate to keep most dinosaurs in or out.

engrams.name: Rope Ladder
engrams.description: A simple rope ladder used to climb up or down tall structures. Can also be used to extend existing ladders.

engrams.name: Sloped Wood Wall Left
engrams.description: A sturdy Wooden sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.

engrams.name: Sloped Wood Wall Right
engrams.description: A sturdy Wooden sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.

engrams.name: Sloped Wooden Roof
engrams.description: An inclined wooden roof. Slightly different angle than the ramp.

engrams.name: Standing Torch
engrams.description: A torch on a small piece of wood that lights and warms the immediate area.

engrams.name: Wooden Cage
engrams.description: A portable cage in which to imprison victims.

engrams.name: Wooden Catwalk
engrams.description: A thin walkway for bridging areas together. Made from sturdy wood.

engrams.name: Wooden Ceiling
engrams.description: A stable wooden ceiling that insulates the inside from the outside, and doubles as a floor for higher levels.

engrams.name: Wooden Door
engrams.description: A stable wooden door that provides entrance to structures. Can be locked for security.

engrams.name: Wooden Doorframe
engrams.description: A wooden wall that provides entrance to a structure.

engrams.name: Wooden Fence Foundation
engrams.description: This very cheap, narrow foundation is used to build fences around an area.

engrams.name: Wooden Foundation
engrams.description: A foundation is required to build structures. This one is made from sturdy wood.

engrams.name: Wooden Hatchframe
engrams.description: A wooden ceiling with a hole in it for trapdoors.

engrams.name: Wooden Ladder
engrams.description: A simple wooden ladder used to climb up or down tall structures. Can also be used to extend existing ladders.

engrams.name: Wooden Pillar
engrams.description: Adds structural integrity to the area it is built on. Can also act as stilts for buildings on inclines.

engrams.name: Wooden Railing
engrams.description: A sturdy wooden railing that acts a a simple barrier to prevent people from falling.

engrams.name: Wooden Ramp
engrams.description: An inclined wooden floor for travelling up or down. Can also be used to make an angled roof.

engrams.name: Wooden Spike Wall
engrams.description: These incredibly sharp wooden stakes are dangerous to any that touch them. Larger creatures take more damage.

engrams.name: Wooden Staircase
engrams.description: A wooden spiral staircase, useful in constructing multi-level buildings.

engrams.name: Wooden Trapdoor
engrams.description: This small wooden door can be used to secure hatches.

engrams.name: Wooden Wall
engrams.description: A sturdy wooden wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity.

engrams.name: Wooden Window
engrams.description: Wooden beams on hinges that cover windows to provide protection from projectiles and spying.

engrams.name: Wooden Windowframe
engrams.description: A wooden wall with a hole for a window.

engrams.name: Stone Arrow
engrams.description: An arrow for the bow.

engrams.name: Tranquilizer Arrow
engrams.description: Less deadly than other arrows, but rapidly increases the victim's torpidity.

engrams.name: Smoke Grenade
engrams.description: Releases a lot of smoke to obscure your plans. Pulling the pin starts a 5 second timer to an explosion.

engrams.name: Spear
engrams.description: An easily made melee weapon that can also be thrown. Has a chance to break when used.

engrams.name: Stone Hatchet
engrams.description: A sharp flint hatchet for harvesting wood from trees, stone from rocks, and skin from bodies.

engrams.name: Stone Pick
engrams.description: A large stone pick for harvesting primarily flint from rocks, thatch from trees, and raw meat from bodies.

engrams.name: Torch
engrams.description: Provides light, and some warmth. Doubles as a melee weapon in a pinch.

engrams.name: Wooden Club
engrams.description: A easily made melee weapon that is excellent for knocking out targets. Only effective at short range.

engrams.name: Bola
engrams.description: Wind it up and throw!

engrams.name: Bow
engrams.description: Masters of the bow often became great conquerors. Requires arrows to fire.

engrams.name: Slingshot
engrams.description: A simple ranged weapon that deals damage from afar. Better for knocking out a target than killing it outright. Requires stone to fire.

engrams.name: Fishing Rod
engrams.description: Apply various bait to this, and then use when sitting on a chair or bench to catch some fish!

engrams.name: Tripwire Alarm Trap
engrams.description: Place two of these near each other to create a trap.

engrams.name: Tripwire Narcotic Trap
engrams.description: Place two of these near each other to create a poisonous trap.
